DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the study is to collect comments form users of new type of hand resting splint.
DOC.brief_title: WOODCAST Hand Resting Splint - Study of User Experience
DOC.detailed_description: An ecologically friendly and biodegradable wood-plastic composite cast (WOODCAST) is used as a hand resting splint in this study.
DOC.criteria: patient treatment involves hand resting splint; age of patient 18 90 years; skills with language Finnish language (written and spoken) decreased cooperation of the patient; patient with multiple illnesses; malignancy; an illness affecting the general health.
